text: Marlon Ramirez (born 17 April 1994 in Honduras) is a Honduran footballer who now plays for C.D. Marathón in his home country.Marlon 'Machuca' Ramírez es fichado por el Marathón Diario Deportivo Diez ==Career== Ramirez started his senior career with C.D.S. Vida. In 2013, he signed for Whitecaps 2 in the American USL Championship, where he made five league appearances and scored zero goals.at Soccerway After that, he played for Charleston Battery, Motagua, C.D. Victoria, Juticalpa, ENPPI SC, C.D. Honduras Progreso, and C.D. Marathón, where he now plays. == References == == External links == * Marlon Ramírez: "They have treated me well, Mario left a good image" * Marlon Ramírez: "I am going with the hope of doing things well" * Marlon Ramírez: "I am living my best moment..." * Marlon Ramírez on Vargas: "I hope the teacher does not marginalize me" Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Honduran footballers Category:C.D. title: Marlon Ramírez
